item.description:
The highly successful Swedish book triology by Stieg Larsson, whose Swedish movie version did extremely well world-wide even with subtitles returns in the American version.  Starring Daniel Craig as the journalist and (in her first role) Roona Marie - Lisbeth Salander, computer hacker, outcast  in the investigation of a 40 year old murder.

This film is also the first in which Filmmaker Robert Brink will lead a discussion after the film. Just what this group is about.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be waiting in the lobby.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: The Girl With the Dragon Tattoo (American version)
